name: hamburger
instructions: Cook the beef on the grill, place it in the bun and add the ingredients to taste.

name: hot dog
instructions: Cook the sausage and place it in the bun, add mustard, ketchup, and shredded cabbage.

name: apple pie
instructions: Prepare the dough, fill with apples, sugar, and cinnamon, and bake until golden.

name: mac and cheese
instructions: Cook the pasta, make a sauce with butter, milk, and cheese, and mix with the pasta.

name: buffalo wings
instructions: Fry the wings and coat them with a mixture of hot sauce, butter, garlic, and vinegar.

name: clam chowder
instructions: Cook the clams with the potatoes and leek, add cream and crispy bacon.

name: chicken fried steak
instructions: Coat the steak, fry it, and cover with creamy white gravy.

name: cheeseburger
instructions: Cook the beef, add cheese on top, and place it in the bun with the vegetables.

name: pulled pork sandwich
instructions: Slow-cook the pork, shred it, and serve with barbecue sauce and coleslaw in a bun.

name: BLT
instructions: Toast the bread, add crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.

name: key lime pie
instructions: Prepare a crust with graham crackers and butter, then add the lime juice and condensed milk mixture, and bake.

name: cornbread
instructions: Mix the ingredients and bake until golden.

name: chocolate chip cookies
instructions: Mix all ingredients, form dough balls, and bake until golden.

name: pancakes
instructions: Mix the ingredients and cook on a griddle until golden brown on both sides.

name: sloppy joes
instructions: Cook the beef with bell pepper and onion, add barbecue sauce, and serve on buns.

name: chili con carne
instructions: Cook the beef with onion, add beans, tomatoes, and chili, and simmer.

name: potato salad
instructions: Boil the potatoes, mix with other ingredients, and refrigerate.

name: tater tots
instructions: Shape the potatoes into small cylinders and fry until golden.

name: steak and potatoes
instructions: Grill the steak and serve with roasted potatoes.

name: s'mores
instructions: Place a marshmallow and a piece of chocolate between two graham crackers and heat.

name: french toast
instructions: Dip the bread in the egg and milk mixture, and fry until golden.

name: biscuits and gravy
instructions: Bake the biscuits and cover with sausage gravy.

name: caesar salad
instructions: Mix all the ingredients and serve.

name: BBQ ribs
instructions: Marinate the ribs in barbecue sauce, slow-cook until tender.

name: fried chicken
instructions: Coat the chicken with flour and egg, fry until golden.
